definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: dub., poss. glow (Ar. gym, ga0ma to thirst, gaymah;un thirst, internal heat), si vera l. (so Du; on form cf. Nö:ZMG xxxvii (1883), 526);—cstr. [[בֵּעְיׇם רוּחוֹ]] Is 11:15, rd. perh. [[בְּעׂחֶם]] (so appar. Vrss) Thes Luzz Krochm Che Gu:Kau Gr Perles:Anal. 52.
